SEARCH

Package ie.atu.sw

package ie.atu.sw
  • Class
    Description
    Book
    Contains the data structure of the book and provides methods for updating and receiving back this data
    BookIndexer
    Implements the methods of an indexer in relation to indexing a book
    BookParser
    A BookParser implements the method to process the words of a line and add them to a data structure as well as keeping track of line and page numbers of the FileInputStream
    BookWordDetail
    Extends WordDetail to include a Set of page numbers
    ConcurrentParser
    A ConcurrentParser implements the method to process each line of the provided InputStream concurrently
    ConsoleColour
    Console colour options
    ConsoleOptions
    Display options to the console for user to select from
    Csv
    Contains the data structure of the dictionary csv and provides methods for updating and receiving back this data
    CsvParser
    A CsvParser overrides the processing of lines from a file to instead separate them by , as well as implementing the processing of halves of a csv line
    Data
    Provides methods for getting user input from the console, as well as being an access layer to the Book, Url, StopWords and Csv data classes.
    Indexer
    Defines the behaviour all indexers should implement
    Menu
    Displays the console UI, facilitates the configuring of data and the creation of the output.
    Output
    Takes data and validates that each part necessary for indexing is present.
    Parser
    Defines the behaviour all parsers should implement
    Runner
    Console interface to get a user specified text file or Url, a dictionary and a list of common words and output them to an ordered index with definitions
    SequentialParser
    A SequentialParser implements the method to process each line of the provided InputStream sequentially
    SinglePageParser
    A SinglePageParser implements the processing of the words in a line to add them to a data structure without keeping track of line or page numbers
    StopWords
    Contains the data structure of the stop words and provides methods for updating and receiving back this data
    Url
    Contains the data structure of the url and provides methods for updating and receiving back this data
    UrlIndexer
    Implements the methods of an indexer in relation to indexing a Url
    WordDetail
    Contains the List of definitions for a word from a dictionary csv
